api-reference/overview.title: API Reference Overview
api-reference/overview.description: Comprehensive API documentation for integrating with the Sloty appointment booking system.

architecture/data-model.title: Data Model
architecture/data-model.description: Sloty's database schema is designed for multi-tenancy, scalability, and flexibility using PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM.

architecture/monorepo-structure.title: Monorepo Structure
architecture/monorepo-structure.description: Sloty uses a monorepo architecture with Turbo for build optimization and shared packages for code reuse.

architecture/multi-tenancy.title: Multi-Tenancy
architecture/multi-tenancy.description: Sloty implements a robust multi-tenant architecture ensuring complete data isolation and security between different organizations.

architecture/overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: Sloty is designed as a modern, scalable multi-tenant SaaS application with a microservice-oriented monorepo architecture.

authentication/overview.title: Authentication Overview
authentication/overview.description: Sloty uses NextAuth.js for secure, flexible authentication with support for multiple providers and robust session management.

core-concepts/overview.title: Core Concepts Overview
core-concepts/overview.description: Understanding the fundamental concepts that power Sloty's appointment booking system.

development/setup.title: Development Setup
development/setup.description: Complete guide for setting up your development environment and contributing to Sloty.

getting-started/configuration.title: Configuration
getting-started/configuration.description: Learn how to configure Sloty for your specific needs and environment.

getting-started/deployment.title: Deployment Guide
getting-started/deployment.description: Learn how to deploy Sloty to production environments with confidence.

getting-started/first-tenant.title: Creating Your First Tenant
getting-started/first-tenant.description: Learn how to set up your first tenant organization and configure it for appointment booking.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: This guide will walk you through setting up Sloty on your local development environment.

intro.title: Sloty SaaS Appointment System
intro.description: Welcome to Sloty, a comprehensive multi-tenant SaaS appointment booking system built with modern web technologies.
